participant_1.background:
I sometimes need to scream to feel alive.
I have a hard time feeling connected with people.
I grew up homeschooled.
I care deeply about animals.
I take my emotions out through art.

participant_2.background:
I love to read the bible before i go to bed.
I favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I am an middle school teacher for 8th grade.
I love to go to the symphony orchestra.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read the Bible before I go to bed, go to the symphony orchestra, and I'm a middle school teacher for 8th grade.
That's interesting. I like to draw and paint, I care deeply about animals, and I grew up homeschooled.
That's cool. I've always liked animals too. I have a dog and two cats.
Oh, that's nice. I have a dog and a cat too.
What's your favorite book in the Bible?
I like the book of Psalms. It has a lot of beautiful poetry and songs.
That's a good choice. I like the book of Proverbs too. It has a lot of wisdom and advice.
I like that one too. I think it's important to learn from the wisdom of others.
I agree. It's always good to have a mentor or someone who can guide us in life.
Yes, I think so too. It's nice to know that you're not alone on your journey.
I agree. I think that's why I like the book of Psalms so much. It's like a conversation between God and the people who are reading it.
Yes, I can see that. It's a very comforting book.
I'm glad you like it. I think it's a good book for anyone who is struggling or feeling lost.
Yes, I think it is too. I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too. I enjoyed talking with you.
Maybe we can talk again sometime.
That would be nice.
